alert.note: Alert for San Juan County; Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 20 at 3:50PM PST until December 22 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...San Juan County, including Stuart Island, Waldron Island, Orcas Island, San Juan Island, Lopez Island, Blakely Island, and Decatur Island and Lowlands of western Whatcom County, including Point Roberts, Lummi Island, Bellingham, and Sumas. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: San Juan County; Western Whatcom County
